modName: Anthi. A Follower with HD head.
summary: Anthi is a standalone follower sculpted using the latest Racemenu sculpt mode and HD heads by Blabba. Her head structure uses more than three thousand polygons, so no more blocky chins and noses. Perfect smoothness from all angles and distance, including extreme close ups for screenarchery.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Anthi is a [b]standalone[/b] follower sculpted by my friend Anthi, using the latest Racemenu sculpt mode and HD heads by Blabba. Her head structure uses more than three thousand polygons, so she has a face which is as natural as possible. No more blocky chins and noses. Perfect smoothness from all angles and distance, including extreme close ups for screenarchery.

She also has a customized and personalized Spell System, made entirely from Creation Kit, explained below.

Supertin made a very epic video of her. Thank you Supertin!
(I love the armor she wears on his video)

[youtube]ZSmNaR5gf-I[/youtube]

[/size][/center][img]http://i.imgur.com/8JJTsYJ.jpg[/img][center]

[size=5]She also uses CBBE or UNP with Fair Skin Complexion textures to have a milky, well pampered type of skin and because these textures also hide quite a lot of flaws. They also include bigger eyes with a fix for invisibility and bigger mouth and better teeth.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/82vl633.jpg[/img] [/size][/center][size=5][center]She is [u]Located in Riften's Mistveil Keep, close to the Jarl of Riften.[/u] She is something like a young Maven Black-Briar. Wears fancy Jarl clothes and has a steel Dagger. Nord, strong willed, independent type of woman. Uses female Commander Type of vanilla voice. I chose the fancy clothes because you first meet her in a palace, but feel free to give her a light armor when you can. She also uses Vanilla follower system for maximum compatibility.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/PPvyYxT.jpg[/img]

[u][b]Perks, Combat Behavior and Spell system[/b][/u]

[b][u]Perks[/u][/b]

Lightfoot, Destruction Apprentice, Agile Defender, Unhidered, Armsman.
[u]Light Armor[/u], One handed, Sneak and Destruction Racial Passive.

[b][u]SPELLS[/u][/b]
(All Vanilla-Made using Creation Kit)
[size=5]
All her spells are [u][b]DESTRUCTION[/b][/u] magic[/size], even heals. Yes, I know. She is meant to be a combat mage though.
Inspired by Toccata's Healing System. All kudos should go to her Author.

While using her [u]Drain spell[/u], Anthi channels health in the area around her, it affects player and followers and can be barely noticed in the player's health bar. It is a good "buff" but not overpowered. You will still die if not careful. It's has an invisible effect, because it would be annoying to have an aura around you in every fight.

She also has a spell that is like the heal spell in Toccata follower (self cast Fire and Forget Area of effect heals) BUT it is much weaker, drains mana fast (especially in the Spellsword type of Combat) and has a 4 second casting time. Which means, if you want heals, make sure no bandits try to smash her with power attacks.

She also has that spell as a Target-Actor/Heal Other type, but will only be available when she reaches lvl 50+.


[b][u]Combat Behavior[/u][/b]

She can be either a SpellSword (one hand sword/spells) or Mage (no weapon).


As a [u]Spellsword[/u] she will attack with her weapon and use her aoe heals
They are not overpowered and she can run out of mana quickly.
When she runs out of mana, she will use her custom drain spell to gain enough to heal again. She will also use her drain spell if she can't reach her target, but if she can, she will go close for melee.

As a [u]Mage[/u] she will use her drain spell which will give her more mana regen, which means more heals for you and the other followers. [/center]
[u][center][b]How to Install:[/b][/center][/u][/size][size=5][center]1. Download one of the 4 different bodytypes
2. Install
3. Use Loot or Boss and whatnot
4. Play le game and kill dragons and shout guards away and stuff.[/center]


[center][u]Mods that will improve your journey with Anthi[/u]: [/center]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26393/?]Vilja[/url] the best follower, who also has a lot of dialogues with Anthi's voicetype.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul[/url] more blabla, and comments and stuff.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework[/url] best follower mod. Fast, easy, compatible with all.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] want pretty, well lit screenshots? Your best and only choice.
[url=http://enbdev.com/]ENB[/url] everything looks better with an ENB. Captain Obvious out!

[center][size=4][b][u]

Troubleshooting/Q and A.[/u][/b]

[/size][/center][size=4][u]Q. What is the expected performance impact?
[/u][/size][size=4]A. None. 0. Not even 0.01fps. [/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4][u]Q. Can I give her the body I made in bodyslide?[/u][/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]A. Yes, choose and install the file that best fits the body you made, then you must do the following.[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]Go to meshes/actors/character/character assets and copy:[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]femalebody_0, femalebody_1, femalefeet_0, [/size][size=4]femalefeet_1[/size][size=4], femalehands_0, femalehands_1 [/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]then paste into the folder:

meshes/actors/Anthi/Anthibody

Overwrite when asked. This will give her the proportions of your bodyslide created body and armors without changing her textures.[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4][u]Q. Can you make...
[/u][/size][size=4]A. No, no requests. [/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4][u]Q.What is your ENB?
[/u][/size][size=4]A. Custom version of [/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57301/?]Naturalistic ENB[/url][/size][size=4].[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4][u]Q. What does the name Anthi mean?[/u][/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]A. Anthi comes from Anthoula. It's Greek and means something along the lines "of flowers".[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qMaTQdc.jpg[/img]

[/size]
[size=5][b][u][center]CREDITS:[/center]
[/u][/b]Anthi

   different voice, face, hairstyle and haircolor. Was sculpt by her but not to look
   like her.
[b][u]

[/url]

Author of KS-hairdo's

StikTrooper
   
   For the eyebrows taken from his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34514/?]Cerami Race[/url].

Sooner266
    
   For the eyebrow [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49168/?]Specularity Fix[/url]  and the perfect skintone settings for ENB.
[size=5]
SEYHEB

   Extensive playtesting and valuable feedback.
[/size]
Teruke

   For pointing out from the very start to the right solution to the problem of the  blue eyes hue bug that occured under certain lighting occassions. He essentially pointed the way to solve a problem, I've been having with every exported and then nifmerged face.

Rxkx22 and Okame28
   
    For introducing the "scriptless" healing system. Studying it was the main reason
    Anthi's spells exist.


*[size=4]Further notes. All assets used either after getting Author permission or by Authors who state free use if credited.[/size]
[center][/center][img]http://i.imgur.com/G3Qaru7.jpg[/img]



[/size][center][/center]
author: Dubhorizon
